trophy.name: Legend of the West
trophy.detail: You've become a true legend of the West!

trophy.name: That Government Boy
trophy.detail: Complete "Exodus in America".

trophy.name: Land of Opportunity
trophy.detail: Complete "The Assault on Fort Mercer".

trophy.name: Sons of Mexico
trophy.detail: Complete "The Gates of El Presidio".

trophy.name: No More Fancy Words
trophy.detail: Complete "An Appointed Time".

trophy.name: A Savage Soul
trophy.detail: Complete "At Home with Dutch".

trophy.name: The Benefits of Civilization
trophy.detail: Complete "And the Truth Will Set You Free".

trophy.name: Into the Sunset
trophy.detail: Complete "The Last Enemy That Shall Be Destroyed".

trophy.name: Nurture or Nature?
trophy.detail: Complete "Remember My Family".

trophy.name: High Roller
trophy.detail: Win over 2000 chips in a hand of Poker.

trophy.name: No Dice
trophy.detail: Complete a game of Liar's Dice without losing a single die.

trophy.name: What About Hand Grenades?
trophy.detail: Get a ringer in a game of Horseshoes.

trophy.name: Austin Overpowered
trophy.detail: Complete Twin Rocks, Pike's Basin, and Gaptooth Breach Hideouts.

trophy.name: Evil Spirits
trophy.detail: Complete Tumbleweed and Tesoro Azul Hideouts.

trophy.name: Instinto Asesino
trophy.detail: Complete Fort Mercer and Nosalida Hideouts.

trophy.name: Fightin' Around the World
trophy.detail: Knock someone out in melee in every saloon in the game.

trophy.name: Strange Things are Afoot
trophy.detail: Complete a task for a Stranger.

trophy.name: People are Still Strange
trophy.detail: Complete 15 tasks for Strangers.

trophy.name: Buckin' Awesome
trophy.detail: Break the Kentucky Saddler, the American Standardbred, and the Hungarian Half-bred.

trophy.name: Clemency Pays
trophy.detail: Capture a bounty alive.

trophy.name: Dastardly
trophy.detail: Place a hogtied woman on the train tracks, and witness her death by train.

trophy.name: Exquisite Taste
trophy.detail: Purchase a rare weapon from a gunsmith.

trophy.name: Bearly Legal
trophy.detail: Kill and skin 18 grizzly bears.

trophy.name: He Cleans Up Well!
trophy.detail: Obtain the Elegant Suit.

trophy.name: Frontiersman
trophy.detail: Obtain Legendary rank in any Ambient Challenge.

trophy.name: The Gunslinger
trophy.detail: Score a headshot on any enemy using Expert targeting mode.

trophy.name: Man of Honor / Chivalry's Dead
trophy.detail: Attain highest Fame rank and either highest Honor rank or lowest Honor rank.

trophy.name: Gold Medal
trophy.detail: Earn a Gold Medal Rank for a combat mission.

trophy.name: Manifest Destiny
trophy.detail: Kill the last buffalo in the Great Plains.

trophy.name: On the Trail of de Vaca
trophy.detail: Uncover every location on the map.

trophy.name: Friends in High Places
trophy.detail: Use a pardon letter with more than $5000 bounty.

trophy.name: Redeemed
trophy.detail: Attain 100% in the Game Completion stat.

trophy.name: Spurred to Victory
trophy.detail: Complete 20 story missions without switching to a new horse at a hitching post.

trophy.name: Heading South on a White Bronco
trophy.detail: Evade the US Marshals while riding the Hungarian Half-Bred horse.

trophy.name: Mowing Them Down
trophy.detail: Kill 500 enemies with a mounted weapon in any game mode.

trophy.name: In a Hail of Bullets
trophy.detail: Kill 500 enemies with any pistol or revolver in any game mode.

trophy.name: Long Arm of Marston
trophy.detail: Kill 500 enemies with any rifle, repeater, or shotgun in any game mode.

trophy.name: Bullseye
trophy.detail: Get 250 headshots in any game mode.

trophy.name: Unnatural Selection
trophy.detail: Kill one of every animal species in the game in any game mode.

trophy.name: Axe Master
trophy.detail: Complete all Tomahawk challenges.

trophy.name: Master Exploder
trophy.detail: Complete the Explosive Rifle Challenge.

trophy.name: The Downward Spiral
trophy.detail: Complete "Curious Tales from Blackwater, USA" Survivor Mission.

trophy.name: Judge A Man By The...
trophy.detail: Complete "Cure For Most of What Ails You" and "Get Back in that Hole, Partner" Survivor Missions.

trophy.name: The Superior Dance
trophy.detail: Complete "Mother Superior Blues Survivor Mission".

trophy.name: All's Right With the World
trophy.detail: Complete "On a Pale Horse".

trophy.name: Spinning Plates
trophy.detail: Have every territory saved at the same time during the Undead Nightmare.

trophy.name: Zed's Dead, Baby
trophy.detail: Attain 100% Game Completion statistic in Undead Nightmare.

trophy.name: Mad Marston: The Trail Warrior
trophy.detail: Attain Rank 5 in all Undead Nightmare Challenges.

trophy.name: Fan Service
trophy.detail: Find and break a unicorn.

trophy.name: Chupathingy
trophy.detail: Find and kill a chupacabra.

trophy.name: Six Years In The Making
trophy.detail: Find and kill a sasquatch.
